heading.motto: EternalCode is a fantastic community of developers!

about.title: About ðŸŽ‰
about.p1: We are a team of programmers with many years of experience, offering a lot of services related to the IT industry!
about.p2: A close-knit team is what sets us apart, we are a pioneer of this type of service in the market. Among other things, we offer help with games, Linux & Windows servers. support related to the choice of hosting, security of server machines and we love to share our programming knowledge!
about.p3: Do you need something more? Or maybe you want us to do a top-notch design for you on commission? We can accomplish everything without much difficulty! We are open to any type of cooperation!

skills.title: Our magic powers!
skills.java: In our lineup you will find many programmers specializing in Java!
skills.php: Do you need a proprietary Itemshop? We can do a professional back-end!
skills.javascript: You can order professional applications and discord bots in JavaScript from us!
skills.linux: We will configure a Dedicated/VPS Server specifically for you, install database and panels etc.

projects.title: Our projects
projects.subtitle: Our projects are not only our services, but also our hobby! We offer many open source products!

team.title: Our team
team.subtitle: Below you will find all the members of our team!
